#!/usr/bin/env ruby

$LOAD_PATH << "#{ENV["TM_SUPPORT_PATH"]}/lib"
require "escape"
require "exit_codes"

ctext = STDIN.read
if ctext =~ /^\s*(.[^\s\w\\]*\s*)/
  cstring = $1
else
  TextMate.exit_show_tool_tip("Unable to determine comment character.")
end

flags = %Q{-p "#{cstring}"}
flags += " --retabify" unless ENV["TM_SOFT_TABS"] == "YES"
flags += " -c #{ENV['TM_COLUMNS'].nil? ? 80 : ENV['TM_COLUMNS']}"

command = "ruby #{e_sh(ENV["TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT"])}/bin/rubywrap.rb #{flags}"
text    = open("| #{command}", "r+") do |wrapper|
  wrapper << ctext
  wrapper.close_write
  wrapper.read
end

print e_sn(text)
